name: KONAMI OTP TOKEN (World Wide)
description: This software token can be used for the KONAMI OTP (One-Time Password) Service.   In addition to this application,  - Acquisition of a KONAMI ID and confirmation of the receipt of an e-mail sent by Konami - Purchase of the Right to Use the software token are required for using the token for the OTP.  The KONAMI ID can be registered through the following link. https://my.konami.net/  For more information about the KONAMI ID, visit the following website. https://my.konami.net/konamiid.html  For more information about the KONAMI OTP, visit the following website. https://my.konami.net/otp.html  To see the Terms of Use on the KONAMI OTP Service, visit the following website. https://id.konami.net/help/otp/agreement/  * Add the URL of the Terms of Use Terms of Use on the KONAMI OTP Service https://my.konami.net/help/otp/agreement/  This is designed to reinforce the authentication of OTP-supported online services, with which the KONAMI ID is used.
